Name: Adventures of musical tones and their notes
About the game: Adventures of Music Tones and Their Notes [/] is an educational computer game for children, with which children learn to sing songs in Bulgarian, to recognize the musical tones in them and to arrange notes. The game is an incentive for the development of the musical-auditory and intellectual abilities of each child.
